channel.title: Devolution help
channel.description:
Yeah on the deltascape source admins cannot trade. But i want to make that to for devo 9.3. I've tryed somethings but gave me errors. Anyone help me please?
Hey. I'm using Devolution 9 u 3 from killamess and i got an problem. How am able to make so you cannot teleport during an duel and up to 20 level wilderniss?

item.title: Devolution help
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

and how i make so they dont lose stuff?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2009, 10:54:13 am[/size][hr]Fixed the trading. But i don’t get the teleport fix. And how i make so admins AND owners doesnt lose stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  • Edit the trading packet, make it check for your rights, and for the person you’re trading, if there above 1, reset the trade.

  • Create a boolean for the coordinates of the wilderness, such as;

boolean inWilderness() { if (absX >= 2940 && absX <= 3400 && absY >= 3524 && absY <= 3970) { return true; } return false; }

Next, wherever you handle your teleports;

if (inWilderness() && absY > 3670) { Send("You can't teleport above level 20 wilderness!"); return; }

Read full topic
